document_data.mainbody:
The Plinth Stone of the Moonmaiden was one of the earliest altars used by the faithful of Sel√ªne on the slopes of Mount Waterdeep.
The Plinth Stone was a massive block of tarnished silver. On its surface was carved a symbol of the Moonmaiden.
The Plinth Stone was stolen by the church of Shar, and hidden in their base of Vanrakdoom. Defaced by carving a Holy symbol of Shar on top of that of the moon goddess, it served as a bier for Gorothirs sarcophagus.
* Lord Vanrak Moonstar the Dark Ranger, death knight of Shar.
